Field Label: ## Alcohol Abuse and Dependence

The next questions are about your use of alcohol including beer, wine, wine coolers, and hard liquor like vodka, gin, whiskey, and mixed drinks.   When I say 'drink', I mean a glass of wine, a bottle or can of beer, a shot of liquor, or a mixed drink. 

 One Standard Drink: 

 12 oz. beer = 1 can or bottle 

 5 oz. wine = 1 small glass 

 1.5 oz. hard liquor = 1 shot or 1 mixed drink
_INTERVIEWER: Is the participant age 12 or older?_
_INTERVIEWER: The participant is under 12. End **Alcohol Abuse and Dependence**  Section.

_INTERVIEWER: The participant never drank alcohol. End **Alcohol Abuse and Dependence**  Section.
Have you ever had more than a sip?
_INTERVIEWER: The participant never drank more than a sip of  alcohol. End **Alcohol Abuse and Dependence**  Section.

### Symptoms: Alcohol Abuse/Dependence

Did your drinking ever cause you to: 

 Have problems at home, work, or school?
How old were you when this happened for the first time?
Have problems at school like getting in trouble or suspended?
How old were you when this happened for the first time?
Have lower grades at school or fail classes?
How old were you when this happened for the first time?
Get into physical fights?
How old were you when this happened for the first time?
Lose friends?
How old were you when this happened for the first time?
Did you continue to drink even though you knew it caused you any of these problems?
How old were you when this happened for the first time?
Did you miss school to go drinking or because you were hung-over?
How many times?
Did you go to school right after you had been drinking or drink while you were at school?
How many times?
Did you drink before you did something important or while you were doing something important-like babysitting or working?
How many times?
Have you ever been arrested because you had gotten into trouble with the police or you were drunk or had been drinking?
How old were you the first time this happened? \r\n\r\n _Code 998 if "always", 999 if "unknown"._
How many times?
Have you been drinking in a situation where you could get hurt -like when using knives, riding a bike, crossing against traffic, swimming, or driving in a car?
How many times?
Did you actually get hurt in any of these situations?

Field Label: ### Dependence\r\n\r\nHave your parents or friends worried about your drinking?
Have you ever felt guilty about your drinking?
Did you ever feel that you should cut down on your drinking?

How old were you the first time? \r\n\r\n _Code 998 if "always", 999 if "unknown"._
How many times have you tried to cut down or stop?
How many times have you tried to cut down and stop and found that you could not?
Have you ever had so much to drink that you passed out?
Has this happened more than once?
How old were you the first time this happened? \r\n\r\n _Code 998 if "always", 999 if "unknown"._
Have you ever had a blackout (i.e., when you did not pass out, but you drank enough so that the next day you could not remember things you said or did)?
How many times has this happened?
How old were you the first time this happened? \r\n\r\n _Code 998 if "always", 999 if "unknown"._
Were there times when you drank more alcohol than you thought you would or planned to drink?
Were there ever times when you drank more often than you thought you would?
Has there ever been a period when you spent so much time drinking or recovering from the effects of alcohol that you had little time for anything else?
In situations where you couldn't drink, did you ever have such a strong desire for alcohol that you couldn't think of anything else?
When you couldn't get alcohol easily, did you worry about where you would get it?
When you couldn't get alcohol easily, did you go to a lot of effort to get it?
Did you ever need to drink a lot more in order to get drUnknown?
Did you find that you could no longer get drUnknown on the amount you used to drink?
Have you ever given up or cut down on important activities - like sports or hanging out with friends or family - because of your drinking?
Has this happened more than once?
### Effects on Mood\r\n\r\nDuring this time, did you ever become sad, depressed, or more irritable?
During this time, did you ever have thoughts about suicide or wanting to hurt yourself?
### Withdrawal and Medical Consequences\r\n\r\nWhen you didn't drink or when you cut down or stopped drinking, did you feel bad or sick?
Did you: \r\n\r\n Have trouble sleeping?
Feel anxious, depressed, or irritable?
Sweat?
Heart beat fast?
Have nausea or vomiting?
Feel weak?
Have headaches?
Have the shakes (hands or trembling)?
See, feel or hear things that were not really there?
Feel extremely shaky or very frightened or nervous?
Have fits, seizures, or convulsions, where you fell to the floor, and had difficulty remembering what happened?
Ever have to have a drink to keep from having any of these symptoms or to make them go away?
Did drinking cause you to have any physical health problems or did drinking make a problem worse?
Liver disease or jaundice (where your skin turned yellow)?
Stomach disease or make you vomit blood?
Cause your feet to tingle/feel numb for many hours?
Memory problems even when you were not drinking (not blackouts)?
Pancreatitis (inflammation of the pancreas)?
Heart damage (i.e., cardiomyopathy)?
Did you continue to drink knowing that drinking caused you to have health problems?
Did drinking cause any other health problem?
